getTab: Print out all opened custom tabs in the debugger
name: SiYuan
dateValidate: Start date must be earlier than end date!

hello.makesure: Before using this template, please read the offical sample, make sure that you've known about the pipeline for plugin developing.

disclaimeDesc:
The Software (hereinafter referred to as the "Software") is developed by an individual and is designed to provide users with the function of synchronizing note data. By using the Software, you signify that you have read, understood and agreed to the entire contents of this disclaimer.
üíª1. Data security
   üöÄ Under the premise of user authorization, the software synchronizes local note files to the Git repository specified by users through the API interface of GitHub or Gitee code repository.
   üöÄ The software is used only as a data transmission tool and does not guarantee the completeness, accuracy or availability of the data.
   üöÄ The Developer shall not be liable for any loss, damage or disclosure of data due to force majeure, hardware failure, software defects, network problems or third-party platform restrictions.
   üöÄ Because this plug-in is developed by individuals, system testing may be limited, users are advised to enable the snapshot function of Sisource Notes or backup data regularly to prevent data loss.
   üöÄ Users should understand and accept that there may be unforeseen risks with this plug-in, such as data loss, corruption, or synchronization errors. To the extent permitted by applicable law, Users should assess the risks of use on their own.
   üöÄ To the extent permitted by applicable law, the Developer shall not be liable for any loss of data, business disruption, or other damage arising from the use or inability to use this Plugin.
üíª2. Privacy and rights
   üöÄ The software will not actively collect, store or share users' personal information, and all data processing is carried out locally on users' devices or in Git code repositories authorized by users.
   üöÄ Users should properly manage their Git accounts, API tokens, and related credentials and be responsible for their data security and access rights.
üíª3. Risks of Use
   üöÄ The Software is provided "AS IS" without any warranty of suitability, reliability, error-free, or compatibility.
   üöÄ Users use the Software at their own risk, and the Developer shall not be liable for any direct or indirect losses arising from the use of the Software, including but not limited to data loss, account blocking, equipment damage or third-party liability.
üíª4. Third-party service dependence
   üöÄ The software relies on API provided by GitHub, Gitee and other third-party code hosting platforms for data synchronization. The availability, stability, security and policy changes of the relevant services are determined by the third party platform and are not under the control and responsibility of the Developer.
   üöÄ If the software cannot be used normally due to access restriction, account suspension, API adjustment or service interruption on GitHub, Gitee and other platforms, the developer shall not be liable for any reason.
üíª5. Legal liability
   üöÄ The user shall not use the Software for any illegal, illegal or infringing acts, otherwise the user shall bear the corresponding legal liability.
   üöÄ If the Software cannot continue to provide services due to laws, regulations or policy adjustments, the developer has the right to terminate the maintenance and update of the Software at any time without taking any responsibility to the user.
üíª6. Updates to this Disclaimer
   üöÄ This disclaimer may be adjusted based on software updates or legal requirements, and users should review the latest version from time to time.

By using the Software, you fully understand and accept all terms of this disclaimer. If you do not agree with this disclaimer, please stop using the software immediately.
hintDesc:
üë• siyuan group - the git plug-in feedback (QQ group: 1015180920)
üìÑ project detailed document
üìÑFrequently Asked Questions and Answers
üíª @ xstarling
recoverAssetsTips: Restore the local file resource path!
platformTypeDesc: After selection, the cloud synchronization and backup functions will be implemented using this type of platform, such as: cloud disk, git platform.
subGitplatformTypeDesc: The specific platform for storing data, such as :gitee/github, etc.
subCloudplatformTypeDesc: The specific platform for storing data, such as: Baidu Netdisk/Alibaba Netdisk, etc.
gitRepoAddressDesc: Please enter the address (full path) of https or ssh in the github/gitee repository
cloudAddressDesc: Please enter the address of https or other protocols in the cloud disk (full path)
gitRepoNameDesc: Please enter the name of the warehouse you want to sync to the github/gitee warehouse
gitRepoBranchDesc: Please enter the name of the branch you want to sync to the github/gitee repository
cloudUserNameDesc: Account name on platforms such as Baidu Netdisk or Alibaba Netdisk
gitUserEmailDesc: The user's email address when synchronizing note data is submitted will be displayed in the submission history
ignoreFilePlaceHolder: Example (separated by semicolons in English format) :.lock; data/*; conf/local.json; data/*.sy
ignoreFileDesc: When synchronizing note data, ignore the files in the text box. [Note] :.lock; Files such as temp/* will not be synchronized.
assetPrefixPlaceHolder:
/data/assets: Starting with "/ "indicates addressing from the root path 
data/assets: Not beginning with "/", addressing from the same-level directory of the file that references the resource file
assetPrefixDesc: Setting this path will replace the resource path [assets/imgxxx.png] in the Source note file with [Set path /imgxxx.pn]
gitTokenORkeyDesc: Login to github/gitee to generate a private token or token for authorized access to a remote repository
cloudTokenKeyDesc: The password of the user logging into the cloud disk or the private access token or token used to authorize access to the cloud disk data
enableSyncDesc: It is recommended to manually click the sync button to trigger a sync when changing from disabled to enabled
syncGenConflictFile: Generate conflict documents when synchronizing conflicts
syncGenConflictFileDesc: When enabled, when a synchronization conflict occurs, a conflict document will be generated locally for direct opening and viewing. When turned off, a pop-up will prompt conflict information, but no conflict document will be generated.
noteTypeDesc: After cloud synchronization is enabled, you can further select the format for synchronizing remote note files
syncRangeDesc: After enabling cloud synchronization, you can further select the synchronization range, [workspace], [data directory] : Data directory in the workspace, [note files] : only note files are synchronized, plug-ins will not be synchronized
syncStrategyDesc: After cloud synchronization is enabled, you can further select a synchronization policy. [Manual synchronization] : The user selects cloud coverage or local coverage, [Automatic synchronization] : the system automatically compares file synchronization content, [cloud coverage local] : The cloud is not displayed, and the cloud is directly pulled down to cover local, [local cloud coverage] : Will not bounce, directly local push to cover the cloud
syncModeDesc: Enable GIT remote synchronization to further select the synchronization mode
manualSync: Manual sync (automatically sync once only when starting)
fullManualSync: Full manual synchronization (complete manual synchronization, including startup/shutdown)
syncIntervalDesc: Time interval for automatic data synchronization after data is no longer changed
latestCommitShaDesc: Hash of the most recent commit of the current device
latestCommitTimeDesc: The last commit time of the current device
fileSyncFailed: ‚ùå file synchronization failed: Please try again, or contact the developer
createFileTreeFailed: ‚ùå Failed to create a file submission tree
getCommitsFailed: ‚ùå Failed to obtain the commit record :
getRepoFileFailed: ‚ùå failed to obtain the repository file
getFileContentFailed: ‚ùå Failed to obtain the file content :
binFileCompareNot: Binary file comparison is not supported yet
confirm_modifyrepo_reset_commit: If the repository address / repository name / user name has changed, do I reset the latest local commit record?
confirm_rollback_text: Files with the same file ID in the same path in the current workspace will be overwritten and irrevocable
warnFinishSettingConfig: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please improve the configuration information in [Settings]
checkNetworkLink: Please check the token configuration on the network connection/Settings screen, and then restart Siyuan Note or this plug-in
initCheckNet: Failed to obtain the remote submission information, please initialize the remote repository / check whether the token configuration on the setup interface is correct / check the network connection
noCommitFile: No modified files/No differences in submitted files
updateLocalAssetsPathInfo: ‚ö†Ô∏è Began to update the local resource file path
updateLocalAssetsPathSucc: ‚úÖ The path of the local resource file was updated successfully
updateLocalAssetsPathFailed: ‚ùå The path of the local resource file was updated failed, please try again!
backupFailed: The system's automatic backup failed. Please manually backup the files to a secure directory and then synchronize the data.
confirm_modifyworkspace_commit: ‚ö†Ô∏è After the synchronization range is modified, the data synchronization will delete the data of the remote out-of-synchronization range content, please confirm whether it is modified?
confirm_sync_refresh_fileTree: Data synchronization has been completed. The file tree indexes of some newly synchronized data are lost. Please confirm whether to re-establish the file tree indexes?
confirm_switch_noteFormat_sync: ‚ö†Ô∏è The note format has been switched and a local overwrite is needed to keep the remote format consistent with the local note format, please confirm whether the [local file overwrite remote] operation is performed immediately (files of the old note format will be deleted)?
confirm_assetsPrefix_illegal:
‚ö†Ô∏è the prefix of the resource file path must end with "assets" or "assets/" 
„Äê confirm „Äë append "assets" after the path; „Äê Cancel „Äë Clear the input resource path prefix

setting.reconfig_platform: The [Platform Type] in the plugin's [Settings] is incorrect. The system has reselected the default [Git Platform].

warn.logfileClearWarn: ‚ö†Ô∏èThe large log file has been packaged. Please clean it up in a timely manner as needed!
